thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Aurion Options Outa Project In Finland To Kinross

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Aurion Options Outa Project In Finland To Kinross
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Aurion Resources Ltd:
* AURION OPTIONS OUTA PROJECT IN FINLAND TO KINROSS * AURION RESOURCES SAYS SIGNED A NON-BINDING LOI WITH KINROSS GOLD GIVING KINROSS RIGHT TO EARN UP TO 70% OF OUTA PROJECT
* AURION RESOURCES LTD - ‍UNDER TERMS OF LOI KINROSS MUST SPEND US$5 MILLION OVER 5 YEARS TO EARN A 70% INTEREST IN PROJECT​
* AURION RESOURCES LTD - ‍KINROSS HAS AGREED TO COMPLETE A FIRM US$1 MILLION EXPLORATION EXPENDITURE OVER FIRST TWO YEARS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
